'''1.19.2 Release Candidate 1''' (known as '''1.19.2-rc1''' in the launcher) is the first release candidate for [[Java Edition 1.19.2]], released on August 4, 2022,<ref>{{Mcnet|minecraft-1-19-2-release-candidate-1|Minecraft 1.19.2 Release Candidate 1|August 4, 2022}}</ref> which fixes an issue causing players to get disconnected with secure chat.<ref name="article_1.19.2">{{Mcnet|minecraft-java-edition-1-19-2|Minecraft 1.19.2|August 5, 2022}}</ref>

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=1.19.2 Release Candidate 1|otherissuescount=1}}
'''Other'''
* Fixed an issue causing players to get disconnected with secure chat.<ref name="article_1.19.2"/></onlyinclude>
